title: Freezing
body:
Maybe once in 10 games, my game will decide to just freeze. I cant see my cursor, or alt-tab out of the game. I end up having to windows-tab, open a new desktop, open task manger there and close the game. Nothing in the help section helped. All my drivers are up to date. If anyone can help me resolve this that would be great.

Specs: 
i7 6700k
GTX 1070 
16gb 2800mhz RAM

replies.body: Freezing can sometimes be a clue that some of the game files aren't working correctly. It could be freezing each time it tries to load a specific file that somehow got lost or corrupted, so let's try running a quick repair through the client first and test it in a practice/custom game.
